Summary: Saw hovering light above San Diego
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to my apartment when I saw what looked to be a giant meteor in thesky. I quickly realized that it didnt follow a straight line and it was changingcolor and shape. I was mesmerized my it and I pulled my car over and got out ofit to watch it. Another person driving honked their horn and pointed at it,equally dumbfounded. It hovered and then moved slowly, then it took off intospace until it was the size of a star, then dissapeared, and then returned. Asmall peice of the object appeared to move off of it and stop. Many peoplewitnessed this, and a helicopter was in the sky during this time, and they musthave seen it as well.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around July 11th 2003
